bio: If you catch a glimpse of Skreek, just run. He can throw you into the deepest pits of despair.

soultimate.name: Meet the Reaper
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops all foes' stats by 25% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All foes' stats are greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Causes damage regardless of foes favorable elements.
skill.name: Penetrate

name: Skreek
